Gundah Aksi Vandalisme Suporter, Iwan Fals Kembali Karang Lagu Soal Sepak Bola
04 Nov 2019, 13:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Maraknya aksi vandalisme yang dilakukan sebagian suporter sepak bola di Indonesia menggelitik hati Iwan Fals. Musisi legendaris Indonesia ini pun menciptakan lagu, yang diniatkan untuk mengubah perilaku oknum suporter tersebut.
Kisah soal Iwan Fals dan lagu soal suporter ini diungkapkan salah seorang karib musisi papan atas Indonesia tersebut, Erwiyantoro. Menurut Erwiyantoro, yang merupakan wartawan senior, lagu tersebut merupakan ungkapan kegundahan sosok Iwan terhadap kondisi suporter.
"Rabu malam, 30 Oktober 2019, sekitar pukul 23.00, saya ditelepon dua orang teman -Raja Pane dan Mimi Alqomar- untuk bergabung menuju istana Iwan Fals. Dan, sampai di sana, si Iwan langsung bicara soal, sepak bola dan turunannya, suporter," papar Erwiyantoro.
"Kenapa, suporter sepak bola bisa sangat brutal? Mengapa PSSI tidak mampu menyelesaikan dendam kesumat antarsuporter?. Padahal, sepak bolaitu kegembiraan," sambungnya menirukan ungkapan kegundahan sosok bernama asli Virgiawan Listanto tersebut .
Mendengar ungkapan kegelisahan Iwan, salah seorang rekannya, Raja Pane, mengusulkan untuk menyusun lagu tentang sepak bola. Iwan pun antusias menyambut ajakan tersebut dan langsung mengambil gitarnya.
Lagu tersebut akhirnya disusun secara keroyokan. Erwiyantoro mencatat bait demi bait lirik lagu, sekaligus mencarikan kata-kata yang layak masuk dalam sebuah lagu. Raja Pane mengiringi dengan gitar. Sementara, selain menyenandungkan lirik yang dibuat, Iwan merekam di ponselnya.
Proses pembuatan lagu tergolong cepat. Kamis (01/11) dini hari, lagu yang diiringi petikan gitar akustik rampung digarap.
â€œMudah-mudahan dengan lagu yang wajib dinyanyikan suporter ini, mampu mengubah mindset dan budaya nonton di dalam stadion. Lagu bergaya hymne ini pun mudah-mudahan segera jadi," tutur Iwan Fals, seperti diungkapkan lagi oleh Erwiyantoro.
Bagi Iwan, ini bukan lagu pertamanya yang bertema sepak bola. Ia sudah pernah menulis lagu Sepak Bola, dan yang paling fenomenal- Mereka Ada di Jalan.
Bagaimana lirik lagu anyar Iwan Fals tersebut? Simak artikel selengkapnya di bawah ini.

Anxious for Supporters' Vandalism, Iwan Fals Returns to the Song of Football
Nov 04 2019, 13:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The rise of vandalism by some football supporters in Indonesia tickled the hearts of Iwan Fals. This legendary Indonesian musician also created a song, which was intended to change the behavior of these supporters.
The story about Iwan Fals and the song about supporters is revealed by a close friend of Indonesia's top musician, Erwiyantoro. According to Erwiyantoro, who is a senior journalist, the song is an expression of Iwan's anxiety about supporters' condition.
"Wednesday night, October 30, 2019, at around 23:00, I was called by two friends - King Pane and Mimi Alqomar - to join Iwan Fals palace. "said Erwiyantoro.
"Why, can football supporters be so brutal? Why is PSSI unable to resolve the grudge between supporters? Even though soccer is excitement," he continued, imitating the expression of anxiety from the original named Virgiawan Listanto.
Hearing the expression of anxiety Iwan, one of his colleagues, Raja Pane, proposed to compose a song about football. Iwan was enthusiastic about welcoming the invitation and immediately took his guitar.
The song was finally composed together. Erwiyantoro recorded verse after verse of song lyrics, while at the same time finding words that were worthy of being included in a song. Raja Pane accompanied with a guitar. Meanwhile, besides humming the lyrics, Iwan recorded on his cellphone.
The process of making songs is relatively fast. Thursday (01/11) early morning, the song accompanied by an acoustic guitar was completed.
"Hopefully with this song that must be sung by supporters, they will be able to change the mindset and culture of watching in the stadium. Hopefully this hymn-style song will soon be ready, "said Iwan Fals, as revealed again by Erwiyantoro.
For Iwan, this is not his first football-themed song. He has written Football songs, and the most phenomenal - They are on the Way.
